PHRASE.LANG: "Doorknobs don't kill people, I kill people." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Mes armes ne tuent pas mes ennemis. Je les tue." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Türgriffe töten keine Leute, ich töte Leute." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Non sono le pistole a uccidere la gente. Sono io." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Los pomos no matan a la gente; yo mato a la gente." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
